## Type of Change
<!-- Update the PR title to match one of these formats: -->

**Examples:**
- ✅ `[MINOR] Add FITS image format support`
- ✅ `[PATCH] Fix WCS header parsing bug`
- ✅ `feat: add batch processing API`
- ✅ `fix: correct rotation angle calculation`

- [ ] `[MAJOR]` - Breaking changes (0.1.0 → 1.0.0)
- [ ] `[MINOR]` - New feature (0.1.0 → 0.2.0)
- [ ] `[PATCH]` - Bug fix (0.1.0 → 0.1.1)
- [ ] `[SKIP]` - Documentation/chore only (no release)

**Or use conventional commit format:**
- [ ] `feat:` - New feature (auto-detected as MINOR)
- [ ] `fix:` - Bug fix (auto-detected as PATCH)
- [ ] `docs:` - Documentation (auto-detected as SKIP)
- [ ] `chore:` - Maintenance (auto-detected as SKIP)

## Testing
<!-- How was this tested? -->

- [ ] Unit tests pass (`make test`)
- [ ] Linter passes (`make lint`)
- [ ] Integration tests pass (if applicable)
- [ ] Manual testing performed
- [ ] Added new tests for new functionality
- [ ] Code follows Go best practices
- [ ] Commits follow conventional format

## Documentation
<!-- Have you updated the documentation? -->

- [ ] Updated README.md (if needed)
- [ ] Updated godoc comments
- [ ] Added/updated examples (if needed)
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md will be auto-generated from commits

## Checklist

- [ ] PR title follows required format (see above)
- [ ] Code has been tested
- [ ] All tests pass
- [ ] Documentation has been updated
- [ ] No breaking changes (or marked as [MAJOR])
